title: Mayurika Kundan Jhumkas: Exquisite Peacock Earrings in Traditional Design
features: Intricately designed peacock motif (Mayura/ నెమలి) on the earring tops. The peacock features vibrant enamel work in blue and red. The Jhumka portion is adorned with expertly set Kundan stones in a unique floral pattern, complemented by a cluster of Kundan stones and a lustrous pearl drop. Expertly hand-crafted design with traditional Hyderabadi polish giving it a rich, heirloom appearance.
occasions: Ugadi. Also suitable for traditional family functions and special occasions.
description: Timeless elegance with a blend of traditional Kundan craftsmanship and modern design aesthetics. The peacock design is a symbol of beauty, grace, and prosperity, making it an auspicious choice for special occasions. The high-quality Kundan stones provide exceptional brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability. A true statement piece that exudes sophistication and cultural richness.
